name: Scientific Computing 3260/5260
body:
### Course Information
* SEMESTER: Spring 2016
* LECTURE: MWF 9:10-10:00, FGH XYZ
* TEXT: None (useful links/documentation will be posted below)
* INSTRUCTOR: Will French (@frenchwr)
* INSTRUCTOR EMAIL: will@accre.vanderbilt.edu
* OFFICE: Hill Center Suite 201
* PHONE: 615-343-4134
